item.title: How Florida Mortgage Rates Are Actually Determined: The Truth Behind Rate Quotes
item.description:
You see “3.75% rates!” on a billboard. You check online and see “3.50% available now!” Then you apply and suddenly your rate is 4.25%. What happened? Here’s how Florida mortgage rates actually workâ€”and why advertised rates rarely apply to your situation.

The Three Layers of Mortgage Rate Pricing

Mortgage rates aren’t pulled from thin air. They’re built in layers:

Layer 1: Base Rate (Market-Driven) The foundation comes from the 10-year Treasury yield and mortgage-backed securities (MBS) market. When bond investors demand higher returns, mortgage rates rise. When they accept lower returns, rates drop.
